explanation: [0-0] In an indoor setting, a young man wearing a black short-sleeved shirt is standing in front of a gray table. On the right side of the table is a red bucket. The man in the black shirt is holding the edge of the bucket with his right hand, his mouth wide open, looking at the table. On the table is a large glass bowl with white text on a black background that reads, "Me when I want Ice Cream:".

[0-4] First, the man in the black shirt pours ice cream from the bucket into the bowl, spilling a chunk of ice cream onto the right side of the table. The scene switches to a man with a beard wearing a gray short-sleeved shirt sitting at a white table. On the table is a black and white checkered plate. The man in the gray shirt is holding a small tub of ice cream with a Minions design in his left hand and a spoon in his right hand. The spoon is in the ice cream tub. In the background, some sneakers can be seen in a transparent shoebox. The man in the gray shirt looks straight ahead and scoops a spoonful of ice cream onto the checkered plate.
